text: absentee voting verification of absentee voter amend rsa ii to read as follows the clerk shall mark the absentee ballot affidavit enveloped envelope with the notation aipids appeared in person id shown and voter verified and note on the clerk s list of absentee voters that the voter has been verified the verified voter s signatures on the application for an absentee ballot shall not be compared to the voter s signature on the absentee ballot affidavit on election day
